MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA6 area of Ayr, affecting properties in Burnside and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Brae of Gadgirth and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:44am on Sunday, 01 November 2020
